BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting of pay and employment equity data
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reporting of pay and employment equity data.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the state legislature to pass and the Governor to sign, A.10935-A and S.8844-A, which would amend the education law to automatically enroll “optional employees” in the New York City Board of Education Retirement System (BERS) after 90 days of employment unless the employee affirmatively opts in or out of the program in advance.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amend the education law to automatically enroll “optional employees” in the NYC Board of Education Retirement System (BERS) after 90 days of employment unless the employee affirmatively opts in or out of the program in advance. (A.10935-A and S.8844-A)

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting of pay and employment equity data
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Reporting of pay and employment equity data.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting of pay and employment equity data
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reporting of pay and employment equity data.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting of pay and employment equity data
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Reporting of pay and employment equity data.

Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
